blogPost.excerpt: DataMool is a predictive, residential real estate investment analysis tool, which helps you to find and to analyze the best investment opportunities nearby.
blogPost.body: DataMool is a predictive, residential real estate investment analysis tool, which helps you to find and to analyze the best investment opportunities nearby.
blogPost.title: DataMool - Predictive property investment opportunities. Worldwide.
blogPost.author: Mark Harris

localize.description: DataMool是一款预测性的住宅房地产投资分析工具，它可以帮助您找到并分析附近的最佳投资机会。
localize.tagline: 预测房产投资机会。全球范围内。

localize.description: DataMool是一款預測性的住宅房地產投資分析工具，它可以幫助您找到並分析附近的最佳投資機會。
localize.tagline: 預測房產投資機會。全球範圍內。

previous.excerpt: Avo takes the busywork out of analytics with a guided workflow that catches errors and syncs across your existing tools (including Amplitude and Mixpanel). For people who are tired of spending more time managing their data than building great products.
previous.title: Avo for PMs - Error proof your analytics

localize.description: Avo通过一个指导性的工作流程，捕捉错误并在现有的工具（包括Amplitude和Mixpanel）之间同步，将繁忙的工作从分析中解放出来。对于那些厌倦了花更多的时间来管理数据而不是建立伟大的产品的人来说。
Avo通過一個指導性的工作流程，捕捉錯誤並在現有的工具（包括Amplitude和Mixpanel）之間同步，將繁忙的工作從分析中解放出來。對於那些厭倦了花更多的時間來管理數據而不是建立偉大的產品的人來說。

next.excerpt: DrillRoom introduces AI for interactive pocket billiards training. Practice your fundamentals with the assistance of a virtual coach. Get real time feedback. Know your stats and track your progress over time. Level Up your game!
next.title: DrillRoom - AI-powered billiard training & stats

localize.description: DrillRoom引入AI进行互动式口袋台球训练。在虚拟教练的协助下练习你的基本功。获得实时反馈。了解您的统计数据，并随着时间的推移跟踪您的进展。提升你的游戏水平!
localize.tagline: AI驱动的台球训练与统计

localize.description: DrillRoom引入AI進行互動式口袋檯球訓練。在虛擬教練的協助下練習你的基本功。獲得實時反饋。瞭解您的統計數據，並隨着時間的推移跟蹤您的進展。提升你的遊戲水平!
localize.tagline: AI驅動的檯球訓練與統計
